GSD.product_version: versions from v5.15 to before v5.15.46
GSD.description:
drm/msm: don't free the IRQ if it was not requested

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.46 by commit beb81c13d020ceb7f8693e65464162e5f249218e, it was introduced in version v5.15 by commit f026e431cf861197dc03217d1920b38b80b31dd9. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: drm/msm: don't free the IRQ if it was not requested
